SJC updates rules on electronics in court; accommodates 'citizen journalists'

The state's highest court updated its rules for media coverage Friday in response to changes in technology used by the press and the rise of bloggers. (Boston Globe)

99 Bottles

Narragansett Cream Ale

Clear gold with a tall, fluffy head and lots of carbonation bubbles rising to the top, it smells lemony with light, grassy hops on the aroma. The beer has a smooth, creamy mouthfeel.
